data:item.name: Conversa Voice Calling
data:item.overview:
This project holds the Conversa Voice Calling App SW Pack. This application software pack enables a complete voice call application over USB using NXP’s i.MX RT1170 crossover MCU and Conversa Voice Suite. 
This project speeds up the evaluation of Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) products and provides sufficient audio quality required to meet the Microsoft Teams specification and receive certification. 
The main_rt1170 branch contains the conversa voice calling software pack for the i.MX RT1170. To see other available devices, please check the other branches.
NOTE: The Conversa library comes with a 10-minute trial timeout.
